text: Hi All, please, may you have a look at <https://gerrit.hyperledger.org/r/#/c/3637/> <https://gerrit.hyperledger.org/r/#/c/3639/> and <https://gerrit.hyperledger.org/r/#/c/3641/>? Thanks :slightly_smiling_face:
<@U0ZR63HLK> comment added to 3637 btw do we want to have that dir under fabric? why?

Yes, this was discussed with <@U0KN2SSKE>. I don't remember exactly the reasons but it was probably because the BCCSP can be considered as a stand alone module that everyone can customize and fabric uses generically

<@U0ZR63HLK>
1 merged
2 CI failure, would you mind rebasing so it would trigger a build? 
3 +2ed
gerrit says that for <https://gerrit.hyperledger.org/r/#/c/3639/> rebase is not needed
I guess, you should have the right to reverify. I have seen other maintainers doing that
<@U0ZR63HLK> <@U0ZJZBJLF> I posted a comment to here: <https://gerrit.hyperledger.org/r/#/c/3637/3//COMMIT_MSG> as I see the mistake remained there :slightly_smiling_face:
sorry, didn't have the time to fix it :disappointed:
Hmmm yeah. But i saw you did a +1 so i thought you're not against mergin.  and its only a typo in the commit message, not in the code.
Hi All, please a look this <https://gerrit.hyperledger.org/r/#/c/3721/>  Thanks much :slightly_smiling_face:
Thanks Murali, I will address it right now
sure, let me look deeper in a bit

id like to get moving on it asap
